data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kayes
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kayes, Mali
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 13,253 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Kayes, Mali.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kayes to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 399 new simple churches in the state of Kayes, Mali. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,996,800 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Yalunka people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kayes.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 13,253 believers in Kayes to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,996,800 people living in Kayes, Mali. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

location.name: Kayes
location.people_groups_list: Maninka, Western, Maninka, Kita, Fulani, Fouta Tooro, Khasonke, Jahanka
